title: UN calls for full inquiry into West Bank shooting
content: Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, who had joint nationality, was reportedly shot dead by Israeli forces during a protest.

title: Former Vice-President Dick Cheney to vote for Kamala Harris
content: The lifelong Republican said Trump had "tried to steal the last election using lies and violence".
